title: Aram issues on new client
body:
So today I tried to get into an A.R.A.M. game on the new client, (which I don't normally use because of reasons, but I am because I can't load the legacy client) and after the champ select screen the client simply turned into a background picture and a "reconnect" button. The loading screen never popped up, and pushing the "reconnect" button didn't do anything. 
rito plz help :( 
*edit: I have also tried to spectate multiple different players games from my friends list and my client simply flashed a black screen, then went back to normal (it also showed my status as spectating for a split second when it flashed the black screen as it faded in and out.)

replies.body: It definitely sounds like you might be having a network problem reaching the game servers.  This is further affirmed by the black screens, because assets are failing to load.  You should go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Let me know if it helps!
